scripts.build-extension: npm-run-all -s clean build-package-json build-docs build-client build-renderer build-server
scripts.build-package-json: npm run build-tmlang && npm run build-i18n && nx build package-json && node ./dist/apps/package-json/main.js && prettier --write ./extension/language/schemas/config
scripts.build-test: nx build vscode-e2e-runner && nx build client-e2e
scripts.package: npm i && npm-run-all build-extension pre-package && vsce package
scripts.package-and-test: npm i && npm-run-all build-extension pre-package test-parsing build-test integration-test && vsce package
scripts.make-integration-tests: npm run package && nx build vscode-e2e-runner && nx build client-e2e
scripts.start: npm run build-package-json && npm run build-renderer-dev && npm run build-docs && nx run-many --target=build --projects=parsing-worker,server,client --watch --parallel
scripts.start-test: nx build vscode-e2e-runner && nx build client-e2e --watch
